metadata.author: William Boericke
metadata.title: Pocket Manual of Homoeopathic Materia Medica
metadata.description: A curated selection from Boericke's Materia Medica, focusing on clinical application and verified symptoms.
metadata.philosophy: Clinically-oriented, focusing on pathological conditions and therapeutic indications. Practical application is key.

keynotes: Burning thirst for large quantities of cold water
Symptoms caused by exposure to dry, cold wind

mindSymptoms.description: Extreme fear of death, predicts the day he will die. Great anxiety and restlessness, does everything in a great haste. Music is unbearable, makes her sad.

keynotes: Sensitive to light, noise, and touch

mindSymptoms.description: Furious delirium, wants to bite, strike, and tear things. Acuteness of all senses. Hallucinations; sees ghosts, hideous faces. Desire to escape or hide.

keynotes: One cheek red and hot, the other pale and cold
Diarrhea like chopped eggs and spinach

mindSymptoms.description: Capricious and quarrelsome. Child is quiet only when carried. Impatient, cannot bear to be spoken to or interrupted. Ailments from anger.

keynotes: Chilly, must be covered in every stage of fever
Ineffectual urging for stool and urination
Wakes at 3 am and cannot sleep again until morning

mindSymptoms.description: Very irritable, sensitive to all impressions. Zealous and fiery temperament. Fault-finding and quarrelsome. Bad effects of a sedentary life.

better: from a nap, if allowed to finish it

keynotes: Mild, gentle, yielding disposition; weeps easily
Symptoms worse in a warm room, better in open air

mindSymptoms.description: Weeps easily; can hardly tell her symptoms for weeping. Seeks sympathy. Changeable moods. Feels forsaken. Ailments from rich food, pork, or ice cream.
